Interface MutableConfig

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Config, ConfigBuilder, ConfigSource, Configurable<Config>, java.util.function.Supplier<Config>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConfigManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMutableConfigDecorator

    public interface MutableConfig
extends Config, ConfigBuilder
